cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 275 mi SSW of Nantucket Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating northeastward, passing southeast of New England tonight and moving toward landfall in Nova Scotia then Newfoundland
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Nova Scotia, Canada (near or just east of Halifax)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Fundy National Park to Shediac NB, Parson's Pond to Triton NL, and Indian Harbour to Stone's Cove NL
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning Woods Hole MA to Sagamore Beach MA, Nantucket & Martha's Vineyard MA, east of Bar Harbor to Eastport ME; Hurricane Warning Hubbards to Avonport NS
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Mid-Atlantic outer waters, Cape Cod and islands, Downeast Maine, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, Gulf of St. Lawrence, southwestern Newfoundland
weather_observation.wind: Gusty northeast winds 20â€“30 mph with occasional gale-force gusts possible Friday night into early Saturday
weather_observation.rainfall: Light rain bands, accumulations generally less than 1 inch
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells and dangerous rip currents along New Jersey and Long Island beaches could disrupt port approaches
